title: Default B Site Smokes from B Main
description: Here are the default smokes for B Site that you can use while your team executes onto B Site from B Main.

title: Early Round Mid Aggression Smoke Placement
description: Use these smokes to either assist your team in taking space in Mid, or to assist your Mid player's defense against enemy players trying to take space in Mid.

title: Standard C Site Exec Smokes
description: Use these standard smokes when pushing onto C Site with your team.

title: Standard B Site Exec Nebula Placement
description: Use these standard smokes when pushing onto B Site with your team.

title: Standard A Site Exec Nebula Placement
description: Use these standard smokes when pushing onto A Site with your team.

title: A Main + A Tree Delay Nebula
description: Use Nebulas to make it more difficult for enemy players to push through these key choke points into A Site.

title: Early Round A Main Nebula + Gravity Well Combo to Contest Space
description: Use this early round Nebula + Gravity Well combo to contest space in A Main.

title: Delay Nebula + Gravity Well for C Bend
description: Use this delay Nebula + Gravity Well combo to make it more difficult for enemy players to push through Bend into C Site, or plant the Spike.

title: C Site Chokepoint Delay Nebula + Gravity Well
description: Here's a simple, but effective, C Site chokepoint delay setup.

title: Early Round Garage ZERO/POINT Default
description: Here's a strong, standard default knife lineup you can use to gather information at Garage. Only Defenders from the lower level of Garage may shoot this knife, letting you commit resources safely.

title: A Lobby to A Short ZERO/POINT
description: A good ZERO/POINT to flush out A Short and get info on enemy positions playing around A Short.

title: Mid Window to B Site ZERO/POINT
description: A good ZERO/POINT to suppress enemies on B Site.

title: Simple A Site ZERO/POINT for A Tower + Defender Spawn Entrance
description: Here's a simple, yet very effective ZERO/POINT that clears out A Tower, and the hallway that connects Defender Spawn to A Site.

title: Simple C Site Execute ZERO/POINT
description: Here's a simple, yet very effective ZERO/POINT that clears out most of back C Site, as well as the corner that Chamber players often play on C Plat.

title: Simple Bottom A Short FLASH/DRIVE
description: Here's a simple, yet very effective Flash to peek the left side of the top of the A Short Ramp. Make sure to peek out right as your flash is popping, so that enemy players don't avoid the flash and then peek you before you can gain an advantage on them.

title: Left C Site Default Post Plant FRAG/MENT
description: This is a great post plant FRAG/MENT for left side C Site Default. Keep in mind, however, that the FRAG/MENT will do more damage to players closer to the center of the FRAG/MENT's radius, and it will not do enough damage to kill a player with full health + full armor if they are defusing the spike on the outer edge of the FRAG/MENT's area of effect.

title: Left A Site Default Post Plant FRAG/MENT
description: This is a great post plant FRAG/MENT for the left side of A Site Default. Keep in mind, however, that the FRAG/MENT will do more damage to players closer to the center of the FRAG/MENT's radius, and it will not do enough damage to kill a player with full health + full armor if they are defusing the spike on the outer edge of the FRAG/MENT's area of effect.

title: B Site Stall / Fast Retake FRAG/MENT
description: Here's a great way to stall / retake the B Site with KAY/O molly, as it disrupts the Attackers planning.

title: A Long to A Lobby ZERO/POINT
description: A good ZERO/POINT to get info in A Main and potentially delay an A Site push.

title: Early Round ZERO/POINT to scan A Lobby + A Garden
description: Here's a simple, yet very effective ZERO/POINT from B Site that scans most of A Lobby and A Garden. Use this at the very beginning of the round, and then retreat back to cover so that enemy players can't peek you from Mid Window.

title: C Logs Pop Flash For C Long
description: This is a great FLASH/DRIVE to pop flash players pushing out of C Long into C Site.

title: Top C Long ZERO/POINT From C Site
description: This is a great ZERO/POINT to catch players at the top of C Long who are pushing into C Site off guard and suppress them, since the ZERO/POINT quickly lands in a spot that is difficult to react to, especially if you haven't seen the ZERO/POINT land there before.

title: B Site Execute Pillar FRAG/MENT
description: Flush out Defenders playing Pillar when executing the B Site with this lineup.

title: How to Contest B Heaven With Mail ZERO/POINT
description: Here's a simple, but effective knife lineup you can use to scan and disable all Defenders contesting B Heaven.

title: Bottom Mid to Top Mid FRAG/MENT
description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for Top Mid to get an enemy out of the box corner or kill them if they stay there.

title: A Main to A Rafters ZERO/POINT
description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for A Rafters from A Main.

title: A Main to A Default FRAG/MENT
description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for A Site default plant spot.

title: A Main to A Site ZERO/POINT
description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for A Site.

title: Mid FLASH/DRIVE Variations From Mail And Ropes
description: Here are some aggressive flashes you can use to contest for Mid control, it is recommended that you coordinate this with your teammates to get maximum value out of it.

title: How to Support Your Teammates A Main From A Heaven
description: Enable your teammates peeking into A Main from A Heaven with this flash lineup, as it blinds all Attackers looking to push. This does not blind your teammate peeking from A Main.

title: B Heaven to B Main ZERO/POINT
description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for B Main to suppress enemies and stop a B Site push.

title: A Tower to A Main ZERO/POINT
description: This is a good A Main ZERO/POINT for getting early info in the round and suppressing your opponents.

title: Mid Link to Mid FLASH/DRIVE
description: A good FLASH/DRIVE to blind enemies peeking mid. Especially useful against enemies peeking mid with an Operator.

title: B Lobby to B Site FRAG/MENT
description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for B Site from B Lobby to delay a defuse.

title: A Lobby to A Tree ZERO/POINT
description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for A Tree from A Lobby to suppress your opponents.

title: B Lobby to B Boat House ZERO/POINT
description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for B Boat House.
